QuestData.Title: A Rare Bloom
QuestData.Description: Many years ago I had a life-mate, Dahaka. We were only bound a short time before she was taken from me.$b$bI have lived long, but I have never known greater pain than that day. I was young and my grief was great; the earth quaked beneath my rage. I laid her to rest upon this cliff.$b$bIt is here where I too will rest, but first a favor.$b$bA rare bloom grows in a cave within the fiery, molten earth of the plateau. It was her favorite.$b$bI would lay the flower upon her grave one last time before I die.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Ember Blossom from the Elemental Plateau.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the Ember Blossom?
QuestData.RewardText: This is a fine Ember Blossom that you have brought to me. I know the danger you faced to retrieve it and I thank you.
